title: Disable SMS Sign-in for a user and clear the ALTSECID
description: When there is an account with AltSecID type 6 with SMS sign-in enable we will skip the user causing a provisioning error, mentioned in previous section, this internal user who has SMS sign-in enabled will have an AltSecId of type 6 SMS Sign-in, to fix the issue the customer will need to the SMS sign-in method, and we will have to clear the ALTSECID, to accomplish this the customer can either use Graph or run the PowerShell script below.

aiSummary.overview: When there is an account with AltSecID type 6 with SMS sign-in enable we will skip the user causing a provisioning error, mentioned in previous section, this internal user who has SMS sign-in enabled will have an AltSecId of type 6 SMS Sign-in, to fix the issue the customer will need to the SMS sign-in method, and we will have to clear the ALTSECID, to accomplish this the customer can either use Graph or run the PowerShell script below. This issue relates to provisioning functionality. The issue typically affects department.
